articles.title: State of emergency declared in American Samoa due to severe weather conditions - RNZ
articles.description: The full impact of huge sea swells across American Samoa and the Cook Islands is only starting to come to light.
articles.content:
The full impact of huge sea swells across American Samoa and the Cook Islands is only starting to come to light.
